body_html:
Sorry for the delay. I found the problem is in a dilemma, because feature columns use different optimizer for DNN and Linear part.

I'll close the issue since I have no good idea of how to fix it, and duplication features are acceptable for me.

body:
Sorry for the delay. I found the problem is in a dilemma, because feature columns use different optimizer for DNN and Linear part.

I'll close the issue since I have no good idea of how to fix it, and duplication features are acceptable for me.
